scripts.create-local-graph: wait-on http-get://127.0.0.1:8000 && graph create testing/testing --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy-local-graph: wait-on http://127.0.0.1:5001/api/v0/version http-get://127.0.0.1:8000 && graph deploy testing/testing --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
